reviewText: Great tree climbing video for beginners like me. Amazon has the wrong picture of a shirt instead of the DVD cover.
On time it's great for very basic
this has all you need to ascend and descend trees. Try learning the knots described. Thanks Mr. Tree Man

Some of the most important techniques of how to climb a tree was not covered at all.
For example, how to use "ascenders" to climb up the tree was not explained at all.
I feel cheated, "Amazon" should give credit for the next purchase...

The video is rather long but does a good job providing the basic knowledge and equipment familiarity required for beginning tree climbers.  Geared primarily to recreational climbing, the basics also apply to the beginning arborist.  The information is presented clearly with closeups that make the knots and climbing techniques easy to learn and apply.
